segments.text: I observe the angled view of this domestic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are ajar, revealing the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is balanced on a two-step stool below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is extended, fingers dipping into the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks precarious, legs splayed unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in his other hand, maybe to steady or collect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a girl watches intently, her palm upturned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not climbing but clearly part of the scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the sink, the adult woman dries a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, water floods from the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It pours over the edge, drenching the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms, her foot submerged without notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a serene garden scene outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm and chaos is startling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the stool will give way any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
